questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
What does CSS stand for?
Which HTML tag is used to define the structure of an HTML document?
Which CSS property is used to change the background color?
What is the purpose of the <div> tag in HTML?
options: To define a division or section in an HTML document

questions.question: Which CSS property controls the size of text?
What is responsive web design?
options: Design that adapts to different screen sizes

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
What is the box model in CSS?
options: A model that describes the rectangular boxes generated for elements

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to control the spacing between elements?
What is a CSS framework?
options: A pre-written CSS code that makes web development faster

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to add an image?
What is the purpose of media queries in CSS?
options: To apply different styles for different devices/screen sizes

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to create an unordered list?
What is the difference between padding and margin in CSS?
options: Margin is space inside, padding is space outside
Padding is space inside the element, margin is space outside

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to make text bold?
What is a wireframe in web design?
options: A low-fidelity blueprint of a web page layout

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to define a table row?
What is the purpose of the alt attribute in an image tag?
options: To provide alternative text for screen readers

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to create rounded corners?
